Sentence.sentence: Of course these practical, insightful designers have determined the course of late twentieth-century fashion.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But will such contests, which are overwhelmingly dominated by Asian and white students from middle-class and affluent families become any more diverse? Many social and cultural factors play roles in determining which promising students get on the path toward international math recognition.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Whether this is right, and if so where and when the ecological axe will fall, is hard to determine with any precision—which is why governments and financial institutions are only beginning to bring such risks into their economic calculations.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But could Norway keep its standard of living and yet cut its emissions to Moroccan or even Ethiopian levels? That question, repeated across a dozen environmental issues and across our diverse planet, is what will ultimately determine whether the human race is living beyond its ecological means as it pursues economic revival.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Their aim was to determine the  relationship between these risk behaviors and mental health issues in teenagers.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The  ROWE  participants  were  allowed  to  freely  determine  when,  where and how they worked – the only thing that mattered was that they got the job done.

Sentence.sentence: After sorting the deals by category, they determined that among the 512 brands associated with the athletes, most involve sporting goods, followed closely by food and beverage brands.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Medical society guidelines are also used by insurance companies to help determine reimbursement ( ' ,  报销 ) policies.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Scientists have devised a way to determine roughly where a person has lived using a strand of hair, a technique that could help track the movements of criminal suspects or unidentified murdervictims.

Sentence.sentence: minister of social security, quickly commissioned a study to determine the causes of and possible cures for this disturbing stale of affairs.

Sentence.sentence: The aim is to ensure that employees have an explicit tool to help them understand their own abilities and aspirations, determine career possibilities, and set (usually short-ter goals.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: My colleagues and I are studying something called augmented reality (a field of computer research dealing with the combination of real-world and virtual reality)," said Christopher Dede, professor in learning technologies at Harvard University, "Alien Contact," for example, is an exercise developed for middle-school students who use hand-held devices that can determine their location.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The scientific part of a negotiation is in determining your strategy.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: A season in the field will help determine which, if any, of the varieties are ready for commercialization.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题(第二套)阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: How Virgin Galactic, regulators and the public respond to this most recent tragedy will determine whether and how soon private space travel can transcend that playground.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Let's hope they' re wise enough not to be fooled by a machine that claims to determine truthfulness at the flip of a switch.

Sentence.sentence: Medical society guidelines are also used by insurance companies to help determine reimbursement policies.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Now, a company in Massachusetts says that by using magnetic brain scans, they can determine with 97% accuracy whether someone is telling the truth.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Outsiders may then find it difficult to determine your contributions and strengths.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: That question, repeated across a dozen environmental issues and across our diverse planet, is what will ultimately determine whether the human race is living beyond its ecological means as it pursues economic revival.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The robot who rescues Spooner's life in I, Robot follows Asimov's zeroth larobots cannot harm humanity as opposed to individual humans or allow humanity to come to harm—an expansion of the first law that allows robots to determine what's in the greater go
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The ROWE participants were allowed to freely determine when, where and how they worked – the only thing that mattered was that they got the job done.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: They must determine the risk of jeopardizing a job offer or a collaboration proposal from those who are wary of— or unfamiliar with—open science.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Through satellite tracking of both the herd and the lions in the area, they will be able to determine if their psychological trickery will work to help keep farmers from shooting lions.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Volunteers read two passages, one about a man who led a life of leisure and another about a man who was over-worked and over-scheduled; when asked to determine which of the two had a higher social status, the majority of the participants said the latter.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都含"决定"之意。
means: decide ： 侧重指经过思考、比较、讨论或询问之后做出的决定。
determine ： 指经过深思熟虑，决心去做某事并坚持施行。
resolve ： 语气较强，强调以坚定不移的信念去做或不做某事，暗含有远大抱负和坚强决心。
settle ： 指排除犹豫、怀疑和争论之后作出明确的最终结论。

stems_affixes.word_buile: determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ate……的→adj.确定的
determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ed……的→adj.下定了决心的
in无+termin界限;末端+able可以……的→没有界限的→无穷无尽的
determinate[adj.确定的]+ive表名词→n.决定之事, 限定词
termin界限;末端+al表名词→n.终点[站];终端
terminate[v.[使]结束,[使]停止]+ion表名词→n.终止,结束
termin界限;末端+ology学科→定出界限的学科→下定义→术语学
termin界限;末端+us→界限之点→终点
de加强+termin界限;末端+e→加强界限→确定
ex出+termin界限;末端+ate表动词→从界限中赶出来→根除
termin界限;末端+ate表动词→定出界限→终结

Sentence.sentence: Applying my own rule, I determined to write them in alphabetical, never letting myself leave out a tough idea.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Determined to be myself, move forward, free of shame and worldly labels, I can now call myself a "marathon winner".

Sentence.sentence: Determined, dad filled our plates with steaming stew and passed them around.

Sentence.sentence: Determining where we are in relation to our surroundings remains an essential skill for our survival.

Sentence.sentence: DDriven by heaven-knows-what motives, he determines to write a book.

Sentence.sentence: He thought of his bird with no seeds and the cake he wanted to buy for his mother, but was determined that he would not tell a lie.

Sentence.sentence: Her father Peter, 44, wantS her to give up school to model full-time, but Sarah, who has taken part in shows along with top models wants to prove that she has brains as well as beauty she is determined to carry on with her education.

Sentence.sentence: If we are not careful, then, we could face a kind of global chess match against very determined, super intelligent machines whose objectives conflict with our own, with the real world as the chessboard.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: If you studied pictures that ancient people left on rock walls and you tried to determine their meaning, you would not detect a deep interest in romance among the artists.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: My ten-year-old was growing and changing right before my eyes, into this determined human being with a passion and a mission.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Phone carriers and consumers need to work together to find ways of determining and communicating what is real.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: The study looked at the range of jobs mothers do, as well as the hours they are working, to determine the figure.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: This made Hannah very sad, and even more determined to do something.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Thus, the keyboard can determine people's identities, and by extension, whether they should be given access to the computer it's connected to—regardless of whether someone gets the password right.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Using expansive gestures with open arms makes us feel more powerful, crossing your arms makes you more determined and lying down can bring more insights.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: When considering a merger, for example, they have traditionally used size to determine when to step in.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Yet, I was determined to go ahead.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: If circumstances always determined the life and prospects of people， then humanity would never have progressed.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: How do archaeologists know where to find what they are looking for when there is nothing visible on the surface of the ground? Typically, they survey and sample ( ' , make test excavations on) large areas of terrain to determine where excavation will yield useful information.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It tells the fashion industry that it must take responsibility for the signal it sends women, especially teenage girls, about the social tape-measure they must use to determine their individual worth.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研阅读原文

sentences.en: I haven't determined yet.
sentences.cn: 我还没有决定呢。

sentences.en: The board determined company policy.
sentences.cn: 董事会决定公司的方针。

sentences.en: He has determined to give up smoking.
sentences.cn: 他已决定戒烟。

sentences.en: Have they determined when to start?
sentences.cn: 他们决定什么时候动身了吗?

sentences.en: The news that he was in trouble determined me to act at once.
sentences.cn: 他陷入困境的消息使我决心立即行动。

sentences.en: We both looked up to determine the source of the water.
sentences.cn: 我们俩都向上看, 以便确定水从何处流下来。

sentences.en: Shall we determine what we are going to do next?
sentences.cn: 我们来确定一下下一步该做什么吧?

sentences.en: I determine him to be a fool.
sentences.cn: 我确定他是一个傻子。

means.word_mean: 限定; 制定; 支配

sentences.en: Economic factors determine the progress which a society can make.
sentences.cn: 经济因素是社会进步的决定因素。

means.word_mean: 最后解决(争端、争执、问题等)；决定

sentences.en: He determined that he would travel to New York this summer holiday.
sentences.cn: 他决定今年暑假将旅行到纽约。

means.word_mean: 给…以明确的目标，指明(方向)，决定…的方向；使有倾向性，促成，促使

sentences.en: They must determine where the conference will take place.
sentences.cn: 他们必须决定在哪里召开会议。

sentences.en: His encouragement determined us to carry on with the study.
sentences.cn: 他的鼓励使我们决心继续学下去。

sentence.cn: 天知道在什么动机的驱使下，他决定写一本书。
sentence.en: Driven by heaven-knows-what motives,  he determines to write a book.
sentence.from: 2019年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

sentence.en: The study looked at the range of jobs mothers do, as well as the hours they are working, to determine the figure.

entry.def: If a particular factor determines the nature of a thing or event, it causes it to be of a particular kind.

example.ex: The size of the chicken pieces will determine the cooking time...
example.tran: 鸡块的大小将决定烹饪时间的长短。

example.ex: Social status is largely determined by the occupation of the main breadwinner...
example.tran: 社会地位很大程度上是由家里经济支柱的职业决定的。

entry.def: To determine a fact means to discover it as a result of investigation.

example.ex: The investigation will determine what really happened...
example.tran: 调查会查明到底发生了什么事情。

example.ex: Testing needs to be done to determine the long-term effects on humans...
example.tran: 需要进行检测以确定其对人的长期影响。

entry.def: If you determine something, you decide it or settle it.

example.ex: The Baltic people have a right to determine their own future...
example.tran: 波罗的海各国人民有权决定自己的未来。

example.ex: The final wording had not yet been determined...

entry.def: If you determine to do something, you make a firm decision to do it.

example.ex: He determined to rescue his two countrymen...
example.tran: 他决意营救自己的两名同胞。

example.ex: I determined that I would ask him outright.
example.tran: 我下定决心要直截了当地问他。

means.word_mean: 1. after a calculation, investigation, experiment, survey, or study;

sentences.sentence: "The physicist who found the elusive particle won the Nobel Prize"

means.word_mean: 2. shape or influence; give direction to;
5. reach, make, or come to a decision about something;
6. fix in scope; fix the boundaries of; the tree determines the border of the property
8. find out, learn, or determine with certainty, usually by making an inquiry or other effort;

sentences.sentence: "I want to see whether she speaks French"
"Check whether the train leaves on time"

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French determiner, from Latin determinare 'limit, fix', from de- 'completely' + terminare 'terminate'

sentences.cn: 他们决定早点出发。
sentences.en: They determined to start early.

sentences.en: We set out to determine exactly what happened that night.

sentences.cn: 年龄和经验是我们选择候选人的决定因素。
sentences.en: Age and experience will be determining factors in our choice of candidate.

sentences.cn: 后天培养对于一个人性格的形成起着重要作用。
sentences.en: Upbringing plays an important part in determining a person's character.

sentences.cn: 会议日期尚待确定。
sentences.en: A date for the meeting has yet to be determined.

sentences.en: I determined that I would ask him outright.

sentences.cn: 最终措辞仍未敲定。
sentences.en: The final wording had not yet been determined...

sentences.cn: 波罗的海各国人民有权决定自己的未来。
sentences.en: The Baltic people have a right to determine their own future...

sentences.cn: 需要进行检测以确定其对人的长期影响。
sentences.en: Testing needs to be done to determine the long-term effects on humans...

sentences.cn: 鸡块的大小将决定烹饪时间的长短。
sentences.en: The size of the chicken pieces will determine the cooking time...

sentences.cn: 社会地位很大程度上是由家里经济支柱的职业决定的。
sentences.en: Social status is largely determined by the occupation of the main breadwinner...

sentences.cn: 调查会查明到底发生了什么事情。
sentences.en: The investigation will determine what really happened...

sentences.cn: 这些故障指示的相互关系对确定对这些故障的响应措施是很重要的.
sentences.en: Correlation of the fault indications is important to determine responsibility for the fault.

sentences.cn: 我确定他是一个傻子.
sentences.en: I determine him to be a fool.

sentences.cn: 根据这些事实他断定这起死亡事件并非自杀.
sentences.en: From the facts, he was able to determine conclusively that the death was not a suicide.

sentences.cn: 遗传和环境决定一个人的性格 吗 ?
sentences.en: Do heredity and environment determine a man's character?

sentences.cn: 反托拉斯当局需要通过调查该协定的影响和目的来确认其合法性.
sentences.en: Antitrust authorities must investigate the effect and purpose of an agreement to determine its legality.

sentences.cn: 曾利用放射学方法来测定这种疾病的分布.
sentences.en: Radiology was used to determine the distribution of the disease.

sentences.cn: 对一个词的理解是按字面意思还是隐喻的意思要视乎上下文和习惯.
sentences.en: It is context and convention that determine whether a term will be interpreted literally or metaphorically.

sentences.cn: 我希望这封信中举述的事实能使你翻然悔悟,弃旧图新.
sentences.en: I hope that these facts I have stated in this letter may determine you to make a clean break with your past and start afresh.

sentences.cn: 我们俩都向上看,以便确定水从何处流下来.
sentences.en: We both looked up to determine the source of the water.

sentences.cn: 我们来确定一下下一步该做什么 吧 ?
sentences.en: Shall we determine what we are going to do next?

sentences.cn: 我们可用三角原理测定山的高度.
sentences.en: We may determine the height of a mountain by trigonometry.

sentences.cn: 不管改革多么困难,我们下决心要进行改革.
sentences.en: We are determined to carry out the reform no matter how difficult it may be.

sentences.cn: 我们下决心要做成这件事.
sentences.en: We were determined that it ( should ) be done.

sentences.cn: 我暗暗下决心: 我一定要少打电话,争取少充卡.
sentences.en: I secretly determined: I have to call less fight for small charge cards.

sentences.cn: 第六, 下决心及工夫将槟城塑造成有品质 、 安全 、 永续、可靠及完整的品牌.
sentences.en: Six, a determined effort to branding as synonymous with quality, safety, sustainability reliability and integrity.

sentences.cn: 每当我费好大的劲儿通过考试时, 我总是下决心下次一定努力学习.
sentences.en: Whenever I have a time passing my examination, I always determined to study bard next time.

sentences.cn: 下决心到达自己目的地的流浪者,绝不会惧怕下雨. 既然选择了前方,便只顾风雨兼程.汪国真.
sentences.en: A wanderer who is determined to reach his destination will never fear the rain.

sentences.cn: 他已下决心如何来克服这些困难.
sentences.en: He has determined how to overcome the difficulties.

sentences.cn: 克林顿来到华盛顿就下决心对首都庞大的新闻队伍或是实施管制或是不予理睬.
sentences.en: Clinton came to Washington determined to dominate or ignore the capital's gigantic press corps.

sentences.cn: 他疲惫不堪,天气越来越热.于是他下决心,一碰到舒适的阴凉处就坐下来休息.
sentences.en: His weariness and the increasing heat determined him to sit down in the first convenient shade.

sentences.cn: 为了实现现代化目标, 中国下决心对科学和技术进行投资.
sentences.en: To fulfill the objective of modernization, China is determined to invest in science and technology.

sentences.cn: 这使他下决心马上采取行动.
sentences.en: This determined him to act immediately.

sentences.cn: 想下决心予以治疗.
sentences.en: Would be determined to treatment.

sentences.cn: 他下决心独立思考,不受任何偏见的支配.
sentences.en: He determined to be swayed by no prejudices.

sentences.cn: 他下决心不让任何人知道这事.
sentences.en: He was determined that no one should know anything about it.

sentences.cn: 杜洛瓦为了报复,下决心要勾引他的妻子.
sentences.en: Duroy determined to avenge himself by attempting to seduce Mme . Forestier.

sentences.cn: 我们下决心不让这样事情再发生.
sentences.en: We were determined that this should never be anything about it.

sentences.cn: 他下决心不让任何人在他之前赶到那里.
sentences.en: He was determined that nobody should get there before him.

sentences.cn: 我下决心走自己的路.
sentences.en: I'm determined to have my own way.

sentences.cn: 像突然惊醒过来似的,苏嘉深吸一口气,抬头望着天, 她在心里暗下决心:不要再想过去的事了!
sentences.en: She took a deep breath and fixed her eyes on the sky, determined not look back.

sentences.cn: 这两兄弟拉开了打架的姿势, 这次真的下决心要开火了.
sentences.en: The two brothers squared away, this time seriously determined to fight.

sentences.cn: 他下决心要克服困难.
sentences.en: He was determined to cut through the difficulties.

sentences.cn: 他下决心致力于解决生产过程中的关键难题.
sentences.en: He is determined to address himself to the key difficult problems in the process of production.

sentences.cn: 不过,如果你下决心要积累财富, 事情也不是太难.
sentences.en: But if you are determined to accumulate wealth, it isn't inordinately difficult.

sentences.cn: 他下决心致力于解决生产过程中的关键问题.
sentences.en: He is determined to address himself to the key problems in the process of production.

sentences.cn: 我们已经破釜沉船,下决心奋战到底.
sentences.en: We have burnt our boats and are determined to fight to the last.

sentences.cn: 当父亲决心已定并说服我, 所以我下决心并尽力爬上山顶.
sentences.en: When father are determined and persuade me, so I resolved and tried to climb the mountain.

sentences.cn: 他下决心不再拖延.
sentences.en: He is determined to delay no more.

sentences.cn: 出狱以后, 他下决心要安分守己.
sentences.en: After he came out of prison, he was determined to keep his nose clean.

sentences.cn: 他感到疲惫,因此下决心,一遇到就近的荫凉处就坐下来休息.
sentences.en: His weariness determined him to sit down in the first convenient shade.

sentences.cn: 他们决定早点出发。
